body_html: That will reduce your GPU memory usage, but is not your fundamental issue. The issue really is you are holding that test graph, which you should resolve by wrapping it in a scope, or just add del test_data, test_label, out, eq, _, predict_label after testing.
body_text: That will reduce your GPU memory usage, but is not your fundamental issue. The issue really is you are holding that test graph, which you should resolve by wrapping it in a scope, or just add del test_data, test_label, out, eq, _, predict_label after testing.
body: That will reduce your GPU memory usage, but is not your fundamental issue. The issue really is you are holding that test graph, which you should resolve by wrapping it in a scope, or just add `del test_data, test_label, out, eq, _, predict_label` after testing.
